description: This Dart file defines the BabyNameProvider class, which manages the state and filtering logic for baby names in a Flutter application. It interacts with a BabyNameRepository to load and filter baby names based on user-selected criteria such as gender, language, rashi, and starting character.

classes.name: BabyNameProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the list of baby names and applies filters based on user preferences, notifying listeners of state changes.

methods.name: loadNames
methods.description: Asynchronously loads all baby names from the database and applies current filters.

methods.name: _applyFilters
methods.description: Applies current filter settings to fetch filtered baby names from the repository.

methods.name: updateSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query string and refreshes the filtered list of names.

methods.name: updateGenderFilter
methods.description: Updates the gender filter and applies new filters.

methods.name: updateLanguageFilter
methods.description: Updates the language filter, resets starting character, and re-applies filters.

methods.name: updateRashiFilter
methods.description: Updates the rashi filter and re-applies filters.

methods.name: updateStartingCharacterFilter
methods.description: Updates the starting character filter and triggers re-filtering.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Resets all filters and clears search query.

methods.name: getStartingCharacters
methods.description: Fetches available starting characters for the selected language from the repository.
